name: Cassie
description: CASSIE creates green air filtration with a patented technology that is placed in ventilation systems. CASSIE disinfects mold, bacteria, and viruses within 8 seconds. Since CASSIE disinfects germs within 8 seconds it is controlled by our web portal.
one_liner: CASSIE creates green air filtration with a patented technology that is placed in ventilation systems. CASSIE disinfects mold, bacteria, and viruses within 8 seconds. Since CASSIE disinfects germs within 8 seconds it is controlled by our web portal.
